name: Gryffindor
startIntroPart1: Where dwell the brave at heart, their daring, nerve and chivalry set Gryffindors apart.
startIntroPart2: The Gryffindor House is known for its bravery, courage, and valiance in the face of danger. Do you have what it takes to lead the most noble of all the Houses?
declaringWar: You have insulted my honour. Prepare for war.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Hello. I give you my warm greetings.
tradeRequest: The house of Gryffindor offers you this fair deal.
uniques: All newly-trained [Military] units [in your cities] receive the [Morale] promotion
No damage penalty for wounded units

name: Slytherin
startIntroPart1: There is no good or evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it!
startIntroPart2: While it may be known for Dark wizards, that's not all Slytherin has to offer. It's a house of cunning, ambition, and refusing to accept what is offered. Do you think you can lead the house of schemers?
declaringWar: The world will be more beautiful without you. Prepare for war.
attacked: Fool! You will soon regret dearly! I swear it!
defeated: You have won, congratulations. I know a loss when I see one.
tradeRequest: Come forth, let us make a deal.
uniques: Instantly gain [500] [Gold] <upon declaring a defensive pact>
Instantly gain [500] [Gold] <upon declaring war with a major Civilization> <after discovering [Civil Service]>

name: Ravenclaw
startIntroPart1: Wit Beyond Measure Is Man's Greatest Treasure.
startIntroPart2: Founded by Rowena Ravenclaw, long ago, the Ravenclaw house is know for intelligence and creativity. Can yours prevail?
declaringWar: Good news for you! I declare war. Actually maybe not good
attacked: Well, that wasn't very nice, was it?
introduction: Hi! Nice to meet you, let's be friends!
hateHello: Can't you just leave me to study?
tradeRequest: Wanna get some presents from me?

name: Hufflepuff
startIntroPart1: You might belong in Hufflepuff, where they are just and loyal, those patient Hufflepuffs are true and unafraid of toil.
startIntroPart2: The house that's always overlooked, Hufflepuff, is not to be underestimated. Their loyalty, patience, and fair play will make them beloved by all. Will you do them justice?
declaringWar: I can't let you go on like this.
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
Allied City-States provide [Happiness] equal to [100]% of what they produce for themselves
